name: Untitled Platformer (adultishgambino)
description:
This is my first game, it was written in unity. It's more of a prototype to learn various mechanics.

The player sprite, movement animation, 3d models & skybox were downloaded from the unity asset store, everything else is my code.

There is likely a lot of bugs and silly things, please feel free to point them out and I'll try to fix them. Currently there is only one level in a very prototypey state, but if you're bored give it  a go!

Currently it has:

- Jump

- Double Jump

- Wall Jumping

- Wall Sliding

- Coyote Time

- Vertical and Horizontal Elevators

- Falling Walls

- Falling Platforms

- Turrets (with health, can be destroyed)

- One level & Final boss with weak bullet hell mechanics

- Checkpoints
